channel.title: P ring wont become staff onlt 317 pi

item.title: P ring wont become staff onlt 317 pi
item.dc:creator: @jamie233 jamie233
item.description:
@jamie233 wrote:

[quote=“Sup22211, post:3, topic:507228”][quote author=jamie233 link=topic=625458.msg4257231#msg4257231 date=1362965376]
Trying to make p ring staff only so in itemassisstant.java i add

if ((wearID == ####) && (c.playerRights == 3)) { c.sendMessage("This is a staff only item."); return false; }
under this

public boolean wear(int wearID, int slot) { int targetSlot = 0;
But normal players can still wield it… anyone know?
[/quote]
Two little tiny mistake
1.Change the #### to the item id you want…
2.change the && (c.playerRights == 3)) { to this:
&& (c.playerRights < 3)) {

this little ‘<’ will say if the playerRights is under tree it will send you that message ( c.sendMessage(“This is a staff only item.”); )[/quote]
I did change the #### just was lazy and posted it off a tut and ill try that thanks

Read full topic
item.source: P ring wont become staff onlt 317 pi

if ((wearID == ####) && (c.playerRights == 3)) { c.sendMessage("This is a staff only item."); return false; }
under this

public boolean wear(int wearID, int slot) { int targetSlot = 0;
But normal players can still wield it… anyone know?[/quote]
Two little tiny mistake
1.Change the #### to the item id you want…
2.change the && (c.playerRights == 3)) { to this:
&& (c.playerRights < 3)) {

this little ‘<’ will say if the playerRights is under tree it will send you that message ( c.sendMessage(“This is a staff only item.”); )
